intro: Senecio kuanshanensis, commonly known as the Kuanshan Senecio, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or mountainous regions, thriving in well-drained soils. It produces small, yellowish flowers that bloom in the summer months. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
